items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress.. ordered another one.
items.body: Warm, comfortable and super cute! The compliments came all day. Love the pockets and it fits fantastic! Read more

items.author: Drummer Girl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: The material is soft and not thick. Very comfortable. Has pockets on each side. It has a good shape. It can be worn to work or a night out. Great style but they do run big. Read more
items.author: Zakka15

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, great fit!
items.body: This is a sweater dress, but don't think of it as a thicker sweater dress; it's not. But I find it perfect to dress up for the holidays with black tights, black booties, and some lovely jewelry. I'm 5'5", 140 lbs, and the medium hits just above my knees and fits great. It's definitely true to size. Looser fit and very comfortable, and I purchased it in black. I had also purchased a nearly identical dress from Pretty Garden because I like their clothing, but it didn't have a sweater-like feel to it at all, and the sleeves at the bottom were just elastic, so that one will be going back. This one has a nicer finish at the end of the sleeves, and it was also slightly less expensive. This dress will be very comfortable and can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Blondie1053

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!!!
items.body: I love this little dress!!!! It has POCKETS!!! Itâ€™s super soft and comfy. The inside is just as soft as the outside. Not too hot. Looks great with over the knee boots. Very good quality!!! I get compliments every time I wear it!!! Read more
items.author: Ginger Russell

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress, just not on me.
items.body: I think the dress is cute, but not for me. I bought it for the length and the button detail on the sleeves. I am tall, 5:9 and 245, and bought a 2xl. The dress did fit. However, I am am a pear/slightly larger on bottom hourglass shape and the dress cut did me no favors. I looked like a mishaped rectangle. So, it maybe for you, but not for me. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great style and price!
items.body: My OFEEFAN Long Sleeve Dress is beautiful! I wore it today and every person I saw complimented me on the dress and how nice I looked in it. The dress is very flattering, comfortable, very soft, warm but not too hot! The cut/style of the dress is very flattering. The concealed pockets are sturdy and deep and are great for carrying my iPhone. Iâ€™m so happy to have found this dress. I recommend that you this dress. Read more
items.author: Shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this dress! You will love it!!
items.body: Buy this dress!! It is a fun dress and very slenderizing. You can dress it up with heels, or throw on some boots. It is very comfortable. I highly recommend it. The fabric is very soft and it flows beautifully. I am 5â€™3â€ and weigh 125. It fits perfectly. You will want one in every color. Read more
items.author: Shelley Hamon

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Beige Plaid, Brown, Blue, Dark Grey, Black, Coffee, Red, Brown Plaid, Purple, Green Plaid, Dark Blue, Caramel, Green, Beige Black Plaid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
